Class UserAccountController

java.lang.Object
controllers.UserAccountController
public class UserAccountController extends Object
Controller responsible for user account management operations.

This controller handles:

  • Subscriber login via subscription code
  • Employee login via username/password
  • Subscriber registration
  • Profile management (view and update)
  • Customer lookup operations for employees
All operations interact with the database through the DBController.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamen Abu Ahmad

      Parameters:
      code - the subscription code to validate
      Returns:
      the login result containing subscriber ID and name on success
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

      Returns:

    • registerSubscriber

      public common.dto.UserAccount.RegisterSubscriberResult registerSubscriber(String fullName, String phone, String email) throws SQLException
      Registers a new subscriber with the provided information.

      Creates a new customer record with subscriber status and generates a unique subscription code.

      Parameters:
      fullName - the subscriber's full name
      phone - the subscriber's phone number (required)
      email - the subscriber's email address (required)
      Returns:
      the registration result containing the subscription code on success
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • lookupCustomerBySubscriptionCode

      public common.dto.UserAccount.CustomerLookupResult lookupCustomerBySubscriptionCode(String subscriptionCode) throws SQLException
      Looks up a customer by their subscription code.

      This operation is typically performed by employees to find customer records.

      Parameters:
      subscriptionCode - the subscription code to search for
      Returns:
      the lookup result containing customer data if found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • updateSubscriberProfile

      public common.dto.UserAccount.CustomerLookupResult updateSubscriberProfile(int subscriberId, String fullName, String phone, String email) throws SQLException
      Updates a subscriber's profile information.

      Only the fields provided will be updated; null or blank values will retain the existing data.

      Parameters:
      subscriberId - the ID of the subscriber to update
      fullName - the new full name (optional)
      phone - the new phone number (optional)
      email - the new email address (optional)
      Returns:
      the lookup result containing the updated customer data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getAllSubscribers

      public List<common.entity.Customer> getAllSubscribers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all registered subscribers.

      This operation is restricted to employees.

      Returns:
      a list of all subscriber customer records
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getCurrentDiners

      public List<common.entity.Customer> getCurrentDiners() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all customers currently dining (with in-progress reservations).

      This operation is restricted to employees.

      Returns:
      a list of customers with IN_PROGRESS status reservations
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
